Text.Page: Rescue Magistrate Madadt with the Anons and arrive at Parthian Refugee Camp.

The guwangis are one of our many enemies. They prey on my people, dragging them back to their village.
"I could rescue Madat."

You bested the arachnens. Perhaps you can massacre the guwangis, too.

I will rally the Khiria while you locate Madat.

We'll rescue him together.
"The rise of one star means another must setâ€¦ I am more than happy to go as this new star will change everything. Mjusu Kraal."
Something is carved under the box: Madadt.
No, please! Please don't kill me!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Did you see an old man in a funny hat?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Yes. Yes! The hat with long ears. I saw him not long ago.

If he's strong enough, the guwangis will enslave him. If not, well, they'll eat anything.

What took so long? Destiny isn't what it used to be.

Let's get out of here!

Well done, southerner. Perhaps I was rash to judge you.

The Khiria have a hideout in the cave up the hill behind me.

Meet me there. The guwangis will want revenge for today.

Welcome to our refuge.

This place is not like home, but it's safe enough. Your forces may join us through the teleportal and your wounded may recover here.
